amendment.description: Amendment requires a management assessment indicator to determine whether the housing agency has conducted an assessment to identify any pest control problems in its public housing and its effectiveness in eradicating or controlling such problems.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 53 as printed in the Congressional Record to require HUD, in developing interim housing authority performance indicators, to include as performance criteria the extent to which a housing authority has identified and acted to eradicate or control any pest problems (such as cockroach infestations) in public housing developments.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Towns amendment (A025) Agreed to by voice vote.
